Html:
Dear All,

Is it possible to add transition to the maincontentregion or any other regions defined in PRISM.

Best regards.

Hi,

You might find the AnimatedTabControl in the StockTrader RI useful to achieve your requirement.

You could check can read the following links where you can find related information about your scenario:

  • Prism v4 Navigation with Animation
  • Transitions between views in Silverlight Business Application

I hope you find this information useful.

Thanks,

Miguel Bronzovic
http://blogs.southworks.net/mbronzovic
